Man suffers life-threatening injuries in shooting

Friend details time line of Petraeus affair

MBTA mobile-ticketing era begins today

Commuter rail customers on North Station lines can now buy and display tickets on smartphones. Other lines and ferries are expected to follow later this month. (Globe)
